title: Cowpens National Battlefield: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip          Whether you plan your own trip entirely or would like to meet up with a ranger, there are a variety of opportunities available to educational groups visiting the park. There is no charge for field trips, but all groups must schedule a field trip in advance. Please use this helpful information sheet and call 864-461-2828 to inquire about availability.
